Title: Shut it Down
Description:
I mussed up. Bad.

It's hard work cutting seeds out of kafa berries! But I noticed goots eat the berries up and give back the seeds... in a day or so.

I fed everything I had to the goots on Kota Peak and now they're nuts! Chargin' everything that moves.

Kota used to be safe for Grummles to gather kafa. Not anymore. Not with them goots. Will you help?
ObjectivesText: Kill 12 Kafa-Crazed Mountain Goats on Kota Peak.
CompletionText: I shoulda never fed them goots.
RewardText: Thank you, friend. Let this be a lesson to you: never feed the goots.
